name: Link3 Mini Shard
description:
Link3 Mini Shard is a unique addition to The Shards NFT collection. Each
Mini Shard can only be obtained through unlocking the Link3 Mystery
Boxes and has a T-value of 1. Despite its smaller size, each Mini Shard
represents a piece of the future we are building together and has been
crafted with intricate details and utility. As a collector, owning a
Mini Shard showcases your commitment to innovation and passion for the
CyberConnect cosmos. Donâ€™t miss out on the opportunity to own a part of
this remarkable collection.
